import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './product.css' import ReactStars from 'react-rating-stars-component' const Product = (props) => { const option={ edit:false, color:"rgba(20,20,20,0.1)", activeColor:"tomato", value:2.5, isHalf:true } return ( <>

{props.product.name}

(250 Reviews)
{props.product.price} ) } export default Product
